Robin is an AI-powered tool designed for dark web Open Source Intelligence (OSINT) investigations. It utilizes Large Language Models (LLMs) to enhance search queries, filter results from dark web search engines, and generate concise investigation summaries, making dark web data more accessible for analysis.

Live Avatar is a framework for generating real-time, streaming, and infinitely long avatar videos driven by audio input. It utilizes a large diffusion model and block-wise autoregressive processing to achieve high frame rates and support extended video generation.

Liam ERD is an open-source tool that automatically generates beautiful, interactive Entity Relationship (ER) diagrams from your database schemas. It simplifies the visualization of complex database structures with a user-friendly interface, seamless reverse engineering, and high performance for projects of all sizes.

ğŸ“ ğ—”ğ—•ğ—¢ğ—¨ğ—§ ğ—§ğ—›ğ—œğ—¦ ğ—£ğ—¥ğ—¢ğ—ğ—˜ğ—–ğ—§

Hyprshot-rs is a Rust utility for capturing screenshots in Wayland environments, specifically Hyprland and Sway. It offers flexible capture modes including full monitor, active monitor, selected region, and selected window, with options to save to disk or copy to the clipboard. The tool features a TOML configuration system and integrates seamlessly with Hyprland for automatic keybinding generation and setup.

Speedtest Tracker is a self-hosted PHP application that automates internet speed tests and monitors connection performance over time. It captures detailed metrics, stores historical data, and provides notifications for performance drops.
